Title: Boss
Contents: A boss can differ from game to game, but is typically a non-respawning enemy character with a named health bar and a custom arena.
Fog gates, health bars, post-defeat actions, and item awards are typically implemented within EMEVD, and cutscenes before or after are initialized from EMEVD.
A boss's arena will utilise collision to setup a 'unstable' play region, meaning that player position is not saved there.
